attributes.action: Abandon the travesty of the Official London Olympic Logo and Replace it with something less vomitous
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The "Lisa" Logo, (Looks like Lisa Simpson performing a sex act), or the "SS" Logo, ( Looks like a deconstructed Swastika).
Both are awful, obnoxious, and not representitive of British History or Culture.
This needs to be replaced with an open competition voted on by the people, not a committee in whitehall.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
